name: The Upstairs Neighbour is Painting. I'm Scared.
name_original: The Upstairs Neighbour is Painting. I'm Scared.
description:
Painting. What could go Wrong?

Keep on painting, wouldn't want to go insane now would we?

The room has four walls, the same as a canvas has four sides. 

Press the button, go ahead!

Make it to 1000 and you will be spared. 

Made for the Dark room Game Jam hosted by Far Side Virtual

Controls: 

A and D to Move

Space key to interact with the button. 

Hope You Enjoy!
